pr_title: Fix issue with lowercase enum type names

timeline.message:
Fix issue with lowercase enum type names

Closes https://github.com/apollographql/apollo-android/issues/1901

timeline.bodyText: This looks like an issue. It shouldn't have extra spaces. Kotlin's trim function may get confused here.
timeline.author: tasomaniac

replies.bodyText: Nevermind, it looks like I shouldn't trust GitHub mobile app for code reviews. The indentation was completely off there.
replies.author: tasomaniac
